text: pitabrakd nasa ke( mou ham meat) staerte ban thveu aoy puok yeung v nge v ng pi preah neanea robsa puok yeung tow haey brasenbae puok yeung minban atthmot( knong karkorp sakkar) champoh preah neanea te noh . haey puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) nung doeng nowpel del puokke kheunh tearounakamm tha tae norna del v nge v ng cheangke pi meakra( da troemotrauv) noh
